artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,692); woman at left in a pink gown with human figures in nature on bottom third of dress and a green hat with yellow and red accents; woman at right in a red gown with black dots and a white hat with blue accents and a white plume
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Fashion plate from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Troisième Année, Septième Cahier, 1 Mai 1792
